name: Cisco Threat Response
description: Cisco Threat Response is built upon a collection of APIs which can be used to integrate your Cisco and third-party security products, automate the incident response process, and manage threat intelligence and security context data in a single location.

options.name: Base Cisco Threat Response API URL
options.description: The base URL for the Cisco Threat Response API including the schema (i.e., https://)

options.name: Valid Client ID
options.description: Valid Cisco Threat Response Client ID

options.name: Valid Client Password
options.description: Valid Cisco Threat Response Client Password
